Welcome to SpectralRadex’s documentation!¶

spectralradex.calculate_spectrum(obs_freqs, v0, radex_params, radex=True)¶

Get the intensity at each frequency provided by the user for a set of physical parameters.

Parameters

  • obs_freqs – An array of the frequencies at which to calculate the intensity.

  • v0 – The LSR velocity of the gas

  • radex_params – A dictionary of parameters for the radex model. See radex.get_default_parameters()

spectralradex.radex.get_default_parameters()¶

Get the default RADEX parameters as a dictionary, this largely serves as an example for the input required for run().

spectralradex.radex.run(parameters, output_file=None)¶

Run a single RADEX model

Parameters

parameters – A dictionary containing the RADEX inputs that the user wishes to set,

:param all other parameters will use the default values. See :func:get_default_parameters: :param for a list of possible parameters.: :param output_file: If not None, the RADEX results are stored to this file in csv format/
